mapper.select: SELECT top 1 id, site, machine_name, status_id, status_value, start_time, end_time, create_time FROM [WLGIOT].[dbo].[t_wlg_molding_machine_status_data] where machine_name = #{machineName} and status_id = 5 order by start_time desc

select status_value, count(1) status_count from t_wlg_molding_machine_status_data where status_id = 5 and start_time >= #{startTime} and start_time < #{endTime} group by status_value order by status_value
